mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Williams, John W.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Lee, Athens Co., O [Lee, Athens County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Williams, John W. Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of 9 and 10 ribs . Location Wounded: In action at Opequan, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/19. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Discharged from service.
